column2: I'd think 45 minutes is a ridiculous wait time for pizza. Let me tell you
column3: Lou Malnati's was worth the wait. The pizza was cheesy and saucy with the perfect cheese to meat ratio. ALSO
column4: the crust was both crispy and soft
column5: and coupled with the cheesiness and sauciness of the pizza ... OMG. Heaven in my mouth. I devoured my personal pizza. I swear I did not even look up from my place 'til I was finished.
